title: WSB's Weekend Bite: Twitter Vs. Elon And Spirit Airlines Vs. Shareholders With Chris DeMuth Jr.
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: This week we're joined by Chris DeMuth Jr., Founder of Sifting The World, to discuss complicated mergers in the market. Specifically, what's happening with Twitter vs. Elon Musk and Spirit Airlines' complicated situation with Frontier and JetBlue. Someone will not be free to move around the cabin.
